text: is a Japanese city in Akita Prefecture on the island of Honshu. The National Agricultural Research Center for Tohoku Region (NARCT) is in Daisen.Wang, Xio fan and Barbara Valent. (2009). Advances in Genetics, Genomics and Control of Rice Blast Disease, p. 306. ==References== ==Other websites== * Daisen City website Category:Cities in Akita Prefecture
title: Daisen, Akita
